description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler for handling OCI container events within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It declares four pure virtual methods for handling start, stop, failure, and state change events of OCI containers, each accepting a container name and a JsonObject with event data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling various OCI container events, intended to be implemented by classes that need to respond to container lifecycle events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has started; provides the container's name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has stopped; provides the container's name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has encountered a failure; provides the container's name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container's state changes; provides the container's name and related data.
